content: Which French painter is best known for his water lily series and other Impressionist works featuring landscapes and gardens?

That sounds like Claude Monet. He's famous for his paintings of water lilies, as well as other landscape and garden scenes. Monet was one of the founders of French Impressionism, and his work is known for its emphasis on light and color. His garden at Giverny, where he painted many of his masterpieces, is also a popular tourist attraction today.
